mapper.select: SELECT mb.bulletin_no, mb.cover_photo, mb.title, m.nickname as "writer", mb.content, mb.matching_state, mb.start_time, mb.end_time, mb.writing_time, mb.animal_count, mb.walk_place_address, mb.matching_kind, mb.client_code FROM matching_board mb join member m on mb.writer = m.member_code WHERE mb.matching_kind = '자율' ORDER BY bulletin_no desc

SELECT mb.bulletin_no, mb.cover_photo, mb.title, m.nickname as "writer", mb.content, mb.matching_state, mb.start_time, mb.end_time, mb.writing_time, mb.animal_count, mb.walk_place_address, mb.matching_kind, mb.client_code FROM matching_board mb join member m on mb.writer = m.member_code WHERE mb.bulletin_no = #{bulletinNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(bulletin_no), 0) + 1 FROM matching_board
INSERT INTO matching_board( bulletin_no, cover_photo, title, writer, content, matching_state, start_time, end_time, writing_time, animal_count, walk_place_address, matching_kind, client_code) VALUES (#{bulletinNo}, #{coverPhoto}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, 1, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, sysdate, #{animalCount}, #{walkPlaceAddress}, #{matchingKind}, #{clientCode})
